name: Technical/presales consultant (SaaS, CPaaS)
description:
About the company:

Global international company that provides Conversational Commerce services from its privately owned cloud platform with 100% in-house developed software. The company provides communications channels, such as SMS, RCS, WhatsApp, Voice and Apple Business Chat combined with a Customer Data Platform and other platform features.

The customer base is spread over 118 countries, generating messages to more than 220 destinations. Customers include Tier 1 enterprises, government agencies, as well as small and medium sized enterprises. Our customers are supported by our teams based in one of our hubs worldwide.


We work for and with some of the largest brands in the world. They use our mobile solutions, easily accessible through web API's and mobile applications that clients use to drive revenue. Specializing in messaging, payments, apps and voice means you can benefit from more knowledge and speed with which we act and react.

Why is the role of Technical Consultant important?

The Technical Consultant is a role which requires a mixture of business, sales, and technical ability. A successful candidate is a result driven individual who operates with a sense of humor when under pressure, can understand and communicate technical concepts, and enjoys selling / dealing with people. This individual must be able to work with little supervision and take initiative to hunt down a resource when they need to find answers or solve problems. This role supports the sales team by conceptualizing business models and building customized product demonstrations that position relevant value propositions.

Key responsibilities:

* Technical support of the sales process

* Business and technical negotiations with Customers, assesses customer needs and scopes the technical solution required to customer requirements

* Acting as technical expert in Customer presentations

* Collaborating with the Headquarters and colleagues from other countries. Participation in joint projects with colleagues from other offices.

.* Technical, post-sales support of Customers.

Requirements:

* * Experience with SMS, OTT solutions, CD and CPaaS

* Experience in sales technical support or in the field of technical sales in a SaaS company

* Serious engineering experience or a great passion to work in the field of IT and technology

* API experience

* High level of self-organization and ability to build productive interaction with remote teams

* Positive, service-oriented personality

Skills in conducting business negotiations, as well as technical negotiations

* Good written and oral communication

* Fluent English

We offer:

  • A challenging job within an innovative and international fast-growing company;
  • Competitive salary 230 000 – 270 000 rub/month gross;
  • Working together with motivated and entrepreneurial colleagues;
  • Onboarding and buddy program to help you to get up to speed;
  • Plenty of opportunity for personal and professional growth through courses and training in our Academy
